name: Amos Bow
r1: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 12%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 8% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
r2: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 15%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 10% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
r3: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 18%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 12% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
r4: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 21%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 14% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
r5: Increases Normal Attack and Aimed Shot DMG by 24%. Increases DMG from arrows shot by a further 16% for every 0.1s that the arrow is in flight, up to 0.5s.
